Wyn Drabble: Perhaps teachers should bring a bit of laughter to the classroom https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wyn-drabble-perhaps-teachers-should-bring-a-bit-of-laughter-to-the-classroom/VHA5HNKS4VHABBYHCHZ62FOZLY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wyn-drabble-perhaps-teachers-should-bring-a-bit-of-laughter-to-the-classroom/VHA5HNKS4VHABBYHCHZ62FOZLY/ Wyn DrabbleIf you follow the paint-by-numbers curriculum, classroom management will be a struggle. Wed, 10 Apr 2024 23:59:00 +0000 Michael Linsin, who founded Smart Classroom Management in 2009, says the key to capturing pupils’ attention is to tap into their desire for adventure, laughter, challenge and fascination, writes Wyn Drabble.
